title: Scottish dumpling
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) water', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '1 tablespoon mixed spice', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '225g (8 oz) chopped mixed dried fruit', '200g (7 oz) sultanas', '225g (8 oz) butter', '250g (9 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 eggs, beaten']
